FuncDef: This command configures static entries to be added to the table. A static MAC-IP entry requires the addition of the MAC address to the FDB as either learned or CStatic (conditional static MAC) in order to become active.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 address for the static entry.
Specifies a 48-bit MAC address in the form xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx, where xx represents a hexadecimal number.
